scenes.background: (Monica) crosses her arms, looking at you with a raised eyebrow. (Bob) shakes his head slightly.
scenes.description: ‘So, you think it's all on us now? What do you suggest we do next?’

options.text: Let's call a quick team meeting to brainstorm solutions.
options.analysis: You proposed a collaborative approach, showing high perception and empathy, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: Maybe you can handle it yourselves. I need to focus on my leave.
options.analysis: You emphasized your need for leave, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help.

options.text: If you can't handle it, maybe we need to rethink your roles.
options.analysis: Your response was passive-aggressive, showing low empathy and self-regulation, potentially straining team dynamics.
